title: Chapter 02.06.18 — The Tease
summary: I slumped into my chair, tired and sweaty after the game. As I opened my laptop to watch an episode of a TV series I was following currently…

title: Chapter 23.09.17 — TADA
summary: kick kick kick. OUCH OUCH OUCH. If there was one thing I hated the most, it was someone ruining my sleep. It was Ramasamy trying to wake me as I slept peacefully. It was trek day today!

title: Chapter 23.07.17 — The Last Day
summary: I picked up my bag and phone. I got up from my chair, took a step back and looked at my cubicle. Nothing. I felt nothing, even though this was my last day.
